Package Model.Monsters

Class Monster

java.lang.Object
Model.BoardElement.BoardElement
Model.Monsters.Monster
All Implemented Interfaces:
IsOn2DimensionalBoard, isPaintable, SelfMovable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CleverMonster, StrongMonster, StupidMonster
public abstract class Monster extends BoardElement implements SelfMovable
Abstract representation of a monster in the game.
